mapper.insert: INSERT INTO favorite (memberIdx, plcyNo, createdAt) VALUES (#{memberIdx}, #{plcyNo}, NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM favorite WHERE memberIdx = #{memberIdx} AND plcyNo = #{plcyNo}
mapper.select: SELECT p.plcyNo, p.plcyNm, p.plcyExplnCn, p.lclsfNm, p.bizPrdEndYmd FROM policy p JOIN favorite f ON p.plcyNo = f.plcyNo WHERE f.memberIdx = #{memberIdx} ORDER BY f.createdAt DESC
